title: Rajputana Ruby Haar Set with Polki Diamonds
materials: Polki Diamonds (వజ్రాలు). Features Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: This exquisite haar features multiple strands of meticulously strung ruby beads, interspersed with lustrous cultured pearls. The centerpiece is a stunning pendant adorned with uncut Polki diamonds set in a traditional Kundan setting. The pendant's design showcases floral motifs, reflecting a blend of Mughal and Rajputana influences. The ruby pendant is set within a halo of Polki diamonds, amplifying its captivating allure.
colors: and warm golden yellow of the 22K gold.
occasions: or cultural events. A statement piece ideal for brides (వధువు) or to elevate any formal attire. Suitable for Muhurtham
description: A timeless piece showcasing the rich heritage of Indian craftsmanship. The combination of ruby beads and Polki diamonds creates a dazzling and regal look. The Hyderabadi Kundan setting adds a touch of royalty and authenticity. This haar is not just jewelry; it's an investment in a piece of art with enduring value and cultural significance. The multi-layered design offers a bold and opulent statement.
